title: Accountant
job_overview:
Job Title: Accountant
Permanent Remote | Full-time

We’re looking for a detail-oriented Accountant with strong expertise in QuickBooks Online and Excel. If you have a solid grasp of accounting principles and love working with numbers, spreadsheets, and financial reports, you might be exactly who we need.
Think you’re the QuickBooks pro we’ve been waiting for? Let’s talk!

What You’ll Be Doing:
Manage end-to-end accounting processes using QuickBooks Online
Prepare financial statements and reports
Conduct account reconciliations and ensure compliance with GAAP
Process accounts payable and receivable transactions
Utilize Excel for data analysis and reporting

What We’re Looking For:
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field
At least 5 years of experience in accounting roles
Proficiency in QuickBooks Online and Excel (pivot tables, vlookups)
Strong attention to detail and analytical skills
CPA certification (nice to have!)
Experience in the medical field as an accountant/bookkeeper (nice to have!)
Available to work in US time zones (Graveyard shift in the Philippines)
Available to start within 2 weeks from job offer

Technical Requirements:
Comfortable in using time-trackers (e.g. Time Doctor)
Own laptop/desktop, noise-cancelling headphones, and webcam
Reliable internet connection (at least 50 Mbps)
Available backup equipment in cases of power and internet outages
Proficiency with Microsoft Office tools and Google Workspace
Proficiency in QuickBooks Online and Excel (pivot tables, vlookups)

Why You’ll Love Working Here:
Competitive Compensation
We offer a salary range of up to Php 65,000 per month, commensurate with experience and qualifications, for a full-time commitment of 40 hours per week. Your expertise is valued, and we ensure your efforts are fairly recognized and rewarded.

Comprehensive Health Coverage:
Your health is our priority. We provide access to high-quality medical insurance, ensuring you and your loved ones have the support and care you need within your country.*

Paid Time Off and Sick Leave:
We believe in work-life balance. Enjoy generous paid time off and sick leave policies, allowing you to recharge, travel, or rest when needed—all while knowing your role is secure.
